mapper.insert: insert into Region(regionName, regionCode, regionStatus, path, createTime) values(#{regionName}, #{regionCode}, #{regionStatus}, #{path}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update Region
regionName = #{regionName},
regionStatus = #{regionStatus},
path = #{path},
updateTime = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id, regionName, regionCode, regionStatus, path, createTime, updateTime from Region
(regionName like concat('%', #{regionName}, '%') or regionCode like concat('%', #{regionName}, '%')) and
regionStatus = #{regionStatus} and
order by
#{item.columnName} #{item.sortType}
